name: intel-hub
description: Unified intelligence platform with local AI

scripts.dev: concurrently -n wm,hub -c blue,yellow "npm run dev --prefix apps/worldmonitor" "npm run dev --prefix apps/intel-hub"
scripts.dev:unified: concurrently -n wm,hub -c blue,yellow "npm run dev --prefix apps/worldmonitor" "npm run dev --prefix apps/intel-hub"
